attributes.action: Force Snapchat to go back to how it was before!!
attributes.background: Snapchat has recently updated the app and millions of users absolutely hate it!! Please could you force them to change it back??

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
